sentence: The Republican National Committee voted to censure Representatives Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger for actions in their positions as members of the January 6th Select Committee not befitting Republican members of Congress.? This was both morally repellent and politically self-destructive.
author: NR Editors
title: The Week

sentence: A year ago, the same House Republican retreat was fraught with drama as Representative Liz Cheney of Wyoming, who then held the third-ranking leadership post, publicly denounced former President Donald J. Trump's election lies.? AROUND NEW YORK A veteran Black female fraud investigator is suing the New York State Department of Financial Services alleging she was treated unfairly compared to white male counterparts.
title: Adams' vax mandate controversy grows
